name: Smash the cars
description:
Smash all the cars, but don't smash the service vehicles.

How to play
  • Once you're ready press the space key to start.
  • Use the arrow up and arrow down or W and S to switch lanes.
  • If you're playing on windows you can use a gamepad to play.
  • Gain points when you collide with other vehicles.
  • When you collide with service vehicles (ambulance vans, police cars,
    fire trucks), you get a warning. Once you have 4 warnings the game is over.
  • Win the game by staying alive.
  • Lose the game by getting 4 warnings
Assets Used

I created all of the art myself. You can download them for free at the links below.

Font: Extrude http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/tester.php?id=238

Music: Bit Bit Loop by Kevin MacLeod https://freepd.com

Sound: https://www.bfxr.net/

Made for QaziJam 11
